validation.validation: Provide Tax Rates that match the Tax Code
Cannot select Recoverable Recoverabilities when using a Non-Taxable Applicability, [applicability]. [SUBJECT TO CHANGE]
Must select a Tax Option for each Tax Rate in the selected Tax Code
You can't enter a Tax Option for this type of transaction.
You must select a Tax Option of Calculate Self-Assessed Tax or Calculate Tax Due to Supplier for a Tax Rate.
Must select a Tax Recoverability for each Tax Rate in the selected Tax Code
You can't enter a Tax Recoverability for this type of transaction.
The tax option doesn't apply to a transaction tax rule for items when revenue is the tax rule type.
The tax recoverability doesn't apply to a transaction tax rule for items when revenue is the tax rule type.

Items_Tax_Rule_Data.description: Element containing information for Tax Rule for Items information at the line level.

validation.validation: The Items Tax Rule Line for [item][:] [category][group] must be unique.
Cannot choose both a Tax Item Group and an Item or Category. Please remove either the Tax Item Group or the Item Descriptor and Category.
An Items Tax Rule Line with Purchase Items or Sales Items cannot be submitted with travel regions.
Enter an item that belongs to the specified category.
You have selected more than 1 Item. Select only 1 Item: Expense, Purchase, Sales.
The items within the chosen Tax Item Group conflict with another item rule line's Tax Item Group.
Rule Type of Item Tax Rule Line for [item][:] [category][group] must match the Rule Type specified for the Item Tax Rule.
Travel Regions cannot be specified without a Tax Items Group, Item, and Category.
You must specify at least 1 tax attribute override on the Items Tax Rule Line for [item][:][category][group].
You must specify at least 1 tax attribute override when you create a generic Items Tax Rule Line.
You cannot enter a worktags tax rule for a transaction tax rule for item with the tax rule type of revenue.
This is a duplicate Name; please enter another name.
Item Tax Rule must be of type Transaction Tax Rule for Item
